data.name: Rogue's Tale - Bloodlines DLC
data.detailed_description:
Rogue's Tale - Bloodlines is the second expansion for Rogue's Tale.

It allows the player to choose a bloodline during character creation after they have been unlocked during earlier runs.

Each bloodline has a number of perks that can give either passive bonuses or they can tweak the way your spells and talents work.

At launch there are two bloodlines to choose from but more are planned for in the coming months.
data.about_the_game:
Rogue's Tale - Bloodlines is the second expansion for Rogue's Tale.

At launch there are two bloodlines to choose from but more are planned for in the coming months.
data.short_description: Rogue's Tale - Bloodlines is the second expansion for Rogue's Tale. It allows the player to choose a bloodline during character creation after they have been unlocked during earlier runs.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 7/8/10
  • Processor: A few years old Intel or AMD gaming CPU
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: A few years old gaming GPU
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OS 10.7+
  • Processor: A few years old Intel or AMD gaming CPU
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: A few years old gaming GPU
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Any distro you can run Steam on
  • Processor: A few years old Intel or AMD gaming CPU
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: A few years old gaming GPU
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
